4305490.name: Humanity's Fall
4305490.description:
Humanity's extinction event was brought on by our own hands. In an effort to give the world back to nature, scientists forcibly "evolved" fauna to withstand the world after humans. Can you build a thriving life next to these new lifeforms and help them work the land to prevent starvation?

Decorate your farm and customize your character

  • Explore the vast world to tame wild animals, and find crops to grow. With humans and trade routes dwindling, not all life's conveniences can be found at a store. 

  • Interact with and befriend the last remaining humans and the animal folk that come next. Bear witness to the lives of these new entities. Will they follow in humanity's footsteps, or pave their own way?

  • Strategize crop layouts to harvest the best crops. Your soil improves as you work the field season to season.

  • Time selling resources to earn the biggest profit. Supply and demand isn't what it used to be. Watch price fluctuations week after week to net the best reward.

  • Sit back and relax for a day of quiet fishing.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
